item.content:encoded:
[full] Introduction to Cruz A blend of clean, modern and minimalist design style, exclusively crafted for modern business requirements and corporate web sites. You can equally use this theme for personal blogging, portfolio and freelance business ventures. With genuine features and supportive documentation, the theme is easy-to-use for beginners as well as developers. So, browse the theme and feel free to ask for, if you have any queries. [/full] [dhr] [one_third] Flexible Layout & Colors Cruz comes with flexible layout options. You can have a boxed layout or a stretched layout. You can also control color schemes for various sections of the site. [tabs] [tab title="Boxed"] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. [/tab] [tab title="Stretched"] Nunc vestibulum ipsum nec libero sodales dignissim. Nulla ac libero neque, sit amet convallis leo. [/tab] [tab title="Custom Colors"] Praesent in dolor eu orci malesuada viverra vitae vel purus. Sed sit amet dui nisl. Vestibulum venenatis, tellus eu posuere faucibus, augue orci faucibus ipsum, sit amet ornare mauris odio id augue. Integer turpis metus. [/tab] [/tabs] [btn link="#"]More on Layout →[/btn] [/one_third] [one_third] Authentic Features Cruz comes with genuine features that are essential for almost any corporate website. Here are some:
    Typography styles & elements 40+ Google fonts Layout Columns and grids Multi column Pricing Grids Tabs, accordions and toggles Product Tour and FAQ features Boxes, lists and CSS3 Buttons
[btn link="#"]Features →[/btn] [/one_third] [one_third_last] Improved User Experience Short codes are very useful in managing the site content. With Cruz, you will find it easy to insert short codes with the click of mouse. Each short code has it’s own option panel where you can control user input and attributes. item.title: Custom Flash Header
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[dropcap]C[/dropcap]ustom Flash banners are another effective way of displaying advertisements and product showcase. You can show flash video movies, rich musical flash presentations or an introductory flash header.
[hr_dotted]
In order to insert a Flash Banner, you can paste the Flash Embed Code inside the “Page Options” panel. This embed code can be obtained from the HTML file which is generated when you publish a flash movie.
A flash banner movie can be of 960px maximum width by any height. All you need is a flash movie (.swf) uploaded into the media library. Finally, you will need to change the src parameter of embed code to the URL of flash movie inside the Media Library.
For your reference and testing, I have included a sample Flash file (.fla) and compiled file (.swf) with the final download. The movie is same as shown on this page.

[full] Introduction to Cruz A blend of clean, modern and minimalist design style, exclusively crafted for modern business requirements and corporate web sites. You can equally use this theme for personal blogging, portfolio and freelance business ventures. With genuine features and supportive documentation, the theme is easy-to-use for beginners as well as developers. So, browse the theme and feel free to ask for, if you have any queries. [/full] [dhr] [one_third] Flexible Layout & Colors Cruz comes with flexible layout options. You can have a boxed layout or a stretched layout. You can also control color schemes for various sections of the site. [tabs] [tab title="Boxed"] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. item.title: Custom Page Banner
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[dropcap]C[/dropcap]ustom page banners can be used to display specific product images or promotional advertisements. This is an effective way to drive attention of visitors for a particular offer or event.
[hr_dotted]
You can easily insert a page banner inside the “Page Options” panel using an image HTML markup, as shown below:
Page banner can be of 960px maximum width by any height. All you need is a nice promotional banner image created in PhotoShop, and uploaded into media library.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[full]
[dropcap]S[/dropcap]how case your specific products using the Tour Feature. You can instantly insert a toured content via visual short codes and start editing the content. There is no limitation to the width of the page. You can use this feature on a “Page with Sidebar” too. On this page, let’s take an example of visual short codes feature and describe some of the short codes with their options. [/full]
[dhr]
[tour heading="Visual Short Codes"] [step title="General Overview"] General Overview Cruz comes with 16 visual short code buttons placed in the third row of TinyMCE editor in “Visual” mode. You can insert various short codes using these buttons. Each button bears it’s own option panel, depending upon the parameters and attributes used by a particular short code.
[/step] [step title="Layout Columns"] Layout Columns The first button is for layout columns. You can easily insert a set of columns for a full width page or normal page using this option. Below is a screen shot or options available with the layout columns short code.
[/step] [step title="Image Frames"] Image Frames You can insert an image and re size it on-the-fly with timthumb script. The short code allows you to select different image styles, prettyphoto and size parameters.
[/step] [step title="CSS3 Buttons"] CSS3 Buttons Cruz comes with 20 color styles on CSS3 Button with 5 different sizes. You can instantly insert a button of your choice and color using the button short code. Here is a screen shot of options available with the button short code.
[/step] [step title="Just for demo"] Just for Demo Cruz comes with 16 visual short code buttons placed in the third row of TinyMCE editor in “Visual” mode. You can insert various short codes using these buttons. Each button bears it’s own option panel, depending upon the parameters and attributes used by a particular short code.
[/step] [/tour]

[dropcap]C[/dropcap]ruz comes with a built in Contact form with ajax/php form validation. You can create a page and assign the Contact Pagetemplate to it. You can also configure your mail sending email address inside the theme options panel. The theme also supports Contact Form 7 Plugin which you can check here.
[hr_dotted]

item.title: Custom Flash Header
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[dropcap]C[/dropcap]ustom Flash banners are another effective way of displaying advertisements and product showcase. You can show flash video movies, rich musical flash presentations or an introductory flash header.
[hr_dotted]
In order to insert a Flash Banner, you can paste the Flash Embed Code inside the “Page Options” panel. This embed code can be obtained from the HTML file which is generated when you publish a flash movie.
A flash banner movie can be of 960px maximum width by any height. All you need is a flash movie (.swf) uploaded into the media library. Finally, you will need to change the src parameter of embed code to the URL of flash movie inside the Media Library.
For your reference and testing, I have included a sample Flash file (.fla) and compiled file (.swf) with the final download. The movie is same as shown on this page.

item.title: Custom Page Banner
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[dropcap]C[/dropcap]ustom page banners can be used to display specific product images or promotional advertisements. This is an effective way to drive attention of visitors for a particular offer or event.
[hr_dotted]
You can easily insert a page banner inside the “Page Options” panel using an image HTML markup, as shown below:
Page banner can be of 960px maximum width by any height. All you need is a nice promotional banner image created in PhotoShop, and uploaded into media library.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickies to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[full]

A blend of clean, modern and minimalist design style, exclusively crafted for modern business requirements and corporate web sites.

[/full] [hr] [one_third]

Flexible Layout Option

Cruz comes with flexible layout options. You can have a boxed layout or a stretched layout. [tabs] [tab title="Tabbed"] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. [/tab] [tab title="Example"] Praesent in dolor eu orci malesuada viverra vitae vel purus. Sed sit amet dui nisl. Vestibulum venenatis, tellus eu posuere faucibus, augue orci faucibus ipsum, sit amet ornare mauris. [/tab] [/tabs] [btn link="#"]More on layout →[/btn] [/one_third] [one_third]

Authentic Features

The theme comes with genuine features that are essential for almost any corporate website.
  • Typography styles & elements
  • Layout Columns and grids
  • Tabs, accordions and toggles
  • Product Tour and FAQ features
  • Boxes, lists and CSS3 Buttons

item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Hi, this is a comment.
To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

item.title: Tour
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[full] [dropcap]S[/dropcap]how case your specific products using the Tour Feature. You can instantly insert a toured content via visual short codes and start editing the content. There is no limitation to the width of the page. You can use this feature on a "Page with Sidebar" too. On this page, let's take an example of visual short codes feature and describe some of the short codes with their options. [/full] [hr] [tour heading="Visual Short Codes"] [step title="General Overview"]

General Overview

Cruz comes with 16 visual short code buttons placed in the third row of TinyMCE editor in "Visual" mode. You can insert various short codes using these buttons. Each button bears it's own option panel, depending upon the parameters and attributes used by a particular short code. [/step] [step title="Layout Columns"]

Layout Columns

The first button is for layout columns. You can easily insert a set of columns for a full width page or normal page using this option. Below is a screen shot or options available with the layout columns short code. [/step] [step title="Image Frames"]

Image Frames

You can insert an image and re size it on-the-fly with timthumb script. The short code allows you to select different image styles, prettyphoto and size parameters. [/step] [step title="CSS3 Buttons"]

CSS3 Buttons

Cruz comes with 20 color styles on CSS3 Button with 5 different sizes. You can instantly insert a button of your choice and color using the button short code. Here is a screen shot of options available with the button short code. [/step] [step title="Just for demo"]

Just for Demo

Cruz comes with 16 visual short code buttons placed in the third row of TinyMCE editor in "Visual" mode. You can insert various short codes using these buttons. Each button bears it's own option panel, depending upon the parameters and attributes used by a particular short code. [/step] [/tour]

item.title: Page Banner
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [dropcap]C[/dropcap]ustom page banners can be used to display specific product images or promotional advertisements. This is an effective way to drive attention of visitors for a particular offer or event. [hr_dotted] You can easily insert a page banner inside the "Page Options" panel using an image HTML markup, as shown below: Page banner can be of 960px maximum width by any height. All you need is a nice promotional banner image created in PhotoShop, and uploaded into media library.

item.title: Flash Banner
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[dropcap]C[/dropcap]ustom Flash banners are another effective way of displaying advertisements and product showcase. You can show flash video movies, rich musical flash presentations or an introductory flash header. [hr] In order to insert a Flash Banner, you can paste the Flash Embed Code inside the "Page Options" panel. This embed code can be obtained from the HTML file which is generated when you publish a flash movie. A flash banner movie can be of 960px maximum width by any height. All you need is a flash movie (.swf) uploaded into the media library. Finally, you will need to change the src parameter of embed code to the URL of flash movie inside the Media Library.

Sample Download Included

For your reference and testing, I have included a sample Flash file (.fla) and compiled file (.swf) with the final download. The movie is same as shown on this page.

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [dropcap]C[/dropcap]ruz comes with a built in Contact form with ajax/php form validation. You can create a page and assign the Contact Pagetemplate to it. You can also configure your mail sending email address inside the theme options panel. The theme also supports Contact Form 7 Plugin which you can check here. [hr]

item.title: Contact Form 7
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[dropcap]C[/dropcap]ruz support default styling for Contact Form 7 Plugin. You can create your own forms using the plugin, and insert them inside the page content or inside any widget area. An example of contact form with the plugin is shown below.
[hr]
